scripts.build: tsdown src/index.ts --format esm --sourcemap --platform browser && tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx concurrently "tsdown src/index.ts --format esm --sourcemap --platform browser --watch" "npx @mariozechner/hotserve --path example:/ --path dist:/dist --port 4000"
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint && tsc --noEmit
